items.name: Mushroom Masala
items.description: Mushrooms are cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Paneer Fingers
items.description: Paneer is cut into strips, marinated with spices and seasonings, coated with a batter and breadcrumbs, and then deep-fried or baked until golden and crispy. The result is a crispy and flavorful snack with a soft and creamy paneer interior.

items.name: Vagharela Bhaat
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish from the state of Gujarat in India.

items.name: Drumstick Curry in Coconut
items.description: South Indian dish prepared by cooking drumsticks (moringa pods) in a creamy and fragrant coconut milk-based gravy. The dish is seasoned with a blend of spices and includes onions, tomatoes, and curry leaves for added flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kerala Chicken Stew
items.description: Dish from the South Indian state of Kerala. It is made with chicken pieces cooked in a rich coconut milk-based gravy along with vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and onions.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sindhi Koki
items.description: Whole wheat flour mixed with gram flour, onions, chillies, sesame seeds and other spices, pan cooked into a flatbread. Served with onion-tomato chutney. (2 koki)

items.name: Paneer Paratha
items.description: Indian cottage cheese mixed with different spices and chilles stuffed inside whole wheat flatbread and cooked on a pan. Served with achar + yogurt. (2 parathas)

items.name: Nadru Yakhni
items.description: A Kashmiri dish made with lotus stem (nadru) cooked in a creamy and aromatic yogurt-based gravy. The lotus stem is simmered in a flavorful combination of spices, ginger, fennel seeds, and bay leaves, along with a generous amount of yogurt, which lends a rich and creamy texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kashmiri Matar Te Kokur
items.description: A popular Kashmiri dish that combines green peas (matar) and chicken (kokur) in a rich and flavorful curry. The dish is prepared with a blend of aromatic spices such as fennel seeds, ginger, cinnamon, cardamom, and Kashmiri red chili powder, giving it a unique and fragrant taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mixed Vegetable & Dal Pakoda
items.description: An Indian fried snack made by combining a mixture of lentils (dal) and finely chopped mixed vegetables

items.name: Erissery
items.description: Vegetarian dish from the South Indian state of Kerala. It is made using a combination of vegetables, primarily pumpkin (mathanga), cooked in a coconut-based gravy. Served with rice.

items.name: Paneer Matar ki Tehri
items.description: Comforting rice dish from north India. It is prepared by cooking basmati rice with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), green peas (matar), and a variety of aromatic spices. Served with yogurt raita and achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Indian rice dish that is layered with succulent lamb meat and aromatic spices. The meat is marinated in yogurt and spices, and cooked separately with fragrant rice, saffron, and fried onions. The two are then layered together and slow-cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to blend together perfectly. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Crispy Chilli Chicken
items.description: An Indo-Chinese dish known for its crunchy texture and spicy flavor. Spicy and succulent chicken is cooked with a fiery blend of chili peppers and aromatic spices.

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Lagan nu Stew
items.description: A hearty and flavorful dish from the Gujarati-Parsi cuisine of India. It is a vegetarian stew made with a variety of vegetables and dal (lentils) cooked in a fragrant blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sali Boti
items.description: A Parsi dish from India, known for its rich and flavorful preparation. It consists of tender pieces of lamb, cooked in a thick and tangy tomato-based gravy. Topped off with crispy potato straws (sali), which adds a delightful crunch and texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Thepla
items.description: Gujarati flatbread that is flavorful, soft, and slightly crispy. It is made using a combination of whole wheat flour and spices. (4 thepla)

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: A comforting dish from the south of India. Toamto, tamarind, garlic, cumin cooked together with homemade rasam powder for a soupy consistency. Served with rice and papad.

items.name: Konkani Chawli Usal
items.description: A flavorful Maharashtrian curry made with tender black-eyed beans cooked in a blend of spices, onions, and tomatoes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Konkani Anda Masala
items.description: A traditional Goan egg curry that features boiled eggs simmered in a flavorful and spicy coconut-based gravy. It is a rich and satisfying dish with a perfect balance of spices, coconut, and tangy flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Himachali Mahani
items.description: A staple in Kangri Dhaam also known as Khatta. Mahani is a tangy Himachali curry made with black chicken peas in a flavourful blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Himachali Chha Gosht
items.description: A delicious and hearty Himachali lamb curry that combines tender pieces of lamb with a flavorful blend of spices, yogurt, and aromatic herbs. It is a traditional dish from the mountainous region of Himachal Pradesh in India, known for its robust flavors and comforting taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sev Puri
items.description: Popular street food of Mumbai. Crispy fried flour dish topped with mashed potato, onions, spicy green chutney, tangy sweet tamrind chutney, sev, fresh coriander and pomogranate seeds. (6 puris)

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Gatte Ki Sabzi
items.description: A traditional Rajasthani curry with chickpea flour dumplings cooked in spicy yogurt based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Rajasthani Junglee Maas
items.description: A fiery and rustic meat curry hailing from Rajasthan, India. It is traditionally prepared with succulent pieces of lamb cooked in a spicy marinade of red chili paste, garlic, and a blend of aromatic spices, resulting in a bold and intense flavor profile that is characteristic of Rajasthani cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kolkata Kathi Roll
items.description: Famous street food of Kolkata. Flaky wholewheat flatbread pan cooked and stuffed with egg omlette, spices, picked onions and cucumber made into a roll.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Paneer Tikka Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that combines the succulent and marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) with fragrant basmati rice, spices, and herbs. It is a delicious fusion of Indian flavors, perfect for biryani lovers and vegetarians. Served with raita and papad

items.name: Achari Chicken Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and tangy rice dish that combines the succulent pieces of chicken marinated in a spicy "achar" or pickle masala with fragrant basmati rice and aromatic spices. It is a delightful fusion of Indian flavors, where the tanginess of the pickle complements the aromatic biryani, resulting in a delicious and satisfying meal. Served with raita and papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki Chaat
items.description: A delicious and healthy Indian street food snack that consists of crispy sweet potato cutlets (tikkis) topped with a variety of chutneys, yogurt, and spices. The dish is a perfect blend of sweet, tangy, and spicy flavors that make it a popular vegetarian option for chaat lovers. (2 tikki)

items.name: Sprouted Moong Ussal
items.description: A nutritious and flavorful dish made with sprouted moong beans. The sprouted moong beans are cooked with a blend of spices, onions, tomatoes, and other ingredients to create a hearty and protein-rich curry. Served with 2 chapati.

items.name: Achari Paneer Channa Pulao
items.description: Chickpeas and Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, garlic, ginger and pickling spices mixed with aromatic basmati rice topped with fresh coriander. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Pork Bafat Masala
items.description: Pork cooked with onions, ginger, chillies, garlic and spicy bafat masala. A Manglorean dish definitely worth trying.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Paneer Chilli
items.description: Stir fried cubed paneer (cottage cheese) with diced bell peppers, onions, and chilies in a spicy and flavorful sauce. It is a popular spicy and savoury Indo-Chinese dish.

items.name: Green Peas Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish prepared with basmati rice and green peas. The rice is cooked with aromatic spices, onions, and peas, resulting in a vibrant and delicious pulao.
